front.title: Relaxing IP TTL setting in MPLS Ping and traceroute

abstract.t: Packets with IP TTL 1 might be filtered by TTL-filtering access control lists deployed to mitigate TTL expiry attacks [CISCO]. Thus MPLS ping and traceroute will be inoperable in these networks if IP TTL is set to 1 according to RFC 4379 [RFC4379] chapter 4.3. This document discuss and updates IP TTL setting in MPLS Ping and traceroute.
